content: next st half_double_crochet in next 14 times 3 half_double_crochet on next treble_crochet using stitch marker or scrap of yarn mark the middle half_double_crochet half_double_crochet on next single_crochet on 8 sts half_double_crochet on next 3 half_double_crochet on next mark the middle half_double_crochet half_double_crochet on last st join and fasten off joining instep pin to center front of bootie from one marker to the other and using cc slip_stitch through both pieces fasten_off top part round 1 join main color to center back chain 3 double_crochet in each double_crochet across side section double_crochet in each st between markers on instep double_crochet on each double_crochet across the other side join 55 sts round 2 chain 1 single_crochet around and decrease evenly to 52 sts round 3 chain 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet around join 52 single_crochet round 4 chain 4 skip one single_crochet double_crochet on next single_crochet chain 1 repeat around join with slip_stitch on top of 3rd chain at beg round 5 chain 1 single_crochet in same st as slip_stitch single_crochet in each single_crochet and chain 1 space around join 52 sts rnds 6-8 chain 3 double_crochet in each st around join 52 sts fasten_off main color round 9 join cc chain 1 reverse single_crochet in each st around join and finish off trim with mc single_crochet around lower edge of sole on remaining loops of round 3 finishing you may use ¼ satin ribbon for ties or crochet ties as instructed below weave ribbon in spaces in round 4 of top part crochet ties you can choose either a ball or a flower as embellishment use 2mm hook ties crochet ball or flower below chain 100 and cut-off leaving about 30 of thread weave the tie in the bootie then pick up loop at the end of tie and crochet the other ball or flower weave in ends ball chain 5 make a 7-treble_crochet cluster on the 5th chain from hk slip_stitch on the beg chain 4 and slip_stitch on the space where you made the cluster flower chain 3 double_crochet in 3rd chain from hook chain 2 slip_stitch in same space chain 2 double_crochet in same space chain 2 slip_stitch in same space 4 times you will have 5 petals cotton baby booties copyright by mimi alelis http //www etsy com/shop php user_id=5349161 pattern for personal use only do not sell or distribute
